name: gc-tachyons
description: This project is an **extension** of [tachyons](https://github.com/tachyons-css/tachyons) and a fork from [vtex-tachyons](https://github.com/vtex/vtex-tachyons). Files in `src/` add or redefine classes in `tachyons`, and the final built files bundle the original `tachyons`.
author: Breno Calazans (@klzs)
